briefdescription.para: a map to store the VAO by name
Draw one of the VBO's created via a name lookup.

parameterdescription.para: the name of the VBO to lookup in the VBO map

briefdescription.para: Draw one of the VBO's created via a name lookup.

parameterdescription.para: the name of the VBO to lookup in the VBO map
the draw mode for the VBO override the default

briefdescription.para: create a triangulated Sphere as a vbo with auto generated texture cords

parameterdescription.para: the name of the object created used when drawing
the sphere radius
the number of triange subdivisions to use

briefdescription.para: create a line based grid (like the maya ground plane)

parameterdescription.para: the name of the object created used when drawing
the width of the grid
the depth of the grid
the number of steps for the grid

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &_name, const Real _radius, Real _height, unsigned int _slices, unsigned int _stacks) noexcept
memberdef.name: createCylinder

briefdescription.para: create a Quad Cylinder as a vbo with auto generated texture cords

parameterdescription.para: the name of the object created used when drawing
the base radius of the Cylinder
the height of the Cylinder
the number of quad elements around the Cylinder
the number of quad elements along the centeral axis

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &_name, Real _base, Real _height, unsigned int _slices, unsigned int _stacks) noexcept
memberdef.name: createCone

briefdescription.para: create a Quad Cone as a vao with auto generated texture cords

parameterdescription.para: the name of the object created used when drawing
the base radius of the cone
the height of the cone
the number of quad elements around the cone
the number of quad elements along the centeral axis

briefdescription.para: create a trinagle fan disk (use as end caps for Cylinder etc)

parameterdescription.para: the name of the object created used when drawing
the disk radius
the number of triangles to form the disk

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &_name, Real _minorRadius, Real _majorRadius, unsigned int _nSides, unsigned int _nRings, bool _flipTX=false) noexcept
memberdef.name: createTorus

briefdescription.para: create a VBO based torus from rings of quads.

parameterdescription.para: the name of the VBO created for calling with the draw method
the inner radius of the torus
the outer radius of the torus.
the precision (number of quads) for the majorRadius
the precision (number of quads) for the minor Radius
flip the texture co-ord generation default false.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &_name, const Real _width, const Real _depth, const int _wP, const int _dP, const Vec3 &_vN) noexcept
memberdef.name: createTrianglePlane

briefdescription.para: create a triangulated plane as a vbo with auto generated texture cords

parameterdescription.para: the name of the object created used when drawing
the width of the plane based on the center of the plane being at 0,0,0
the height of the plane based on the center of the plane being at 0,0,0
the precision of the width, this is basically the steps (per quad) which will be triangulated for each (wP == 1 will give 1 quad mad of 2 tris)
the precision of the Depth, this is basically the steps (per quad) which will be triangulated for each (wP == 1 will give 1 quad mad of 2 tris)
The Vertex normal (used for each vertex)

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &_name, const Real _radius=1.0f, const Real _height=2.0f, const int _precision=20) noexcept
memberdef.name: createCapsule

briefdescription.para: create a triangulated capsule (Cylinder with spherical ends)

parameterdescription.para: the name of the object created used when drawing
the radius of the capsule
the height of the capsule
the precision of the tri mesh created (number of steps)

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &_name, const std::string &_fName, const GLenum _type) noexcept
memberdef.name: loadBinary

briefdescription.para: load a VBO from a binary file created from Obj2VBO program

parameterdescription.para: the name of the VBO to be stored as ref to this object
the name of the file to load.
the draw mode type

briefdescription.para: clear the VAO elements created (is also called by dtor) This is usefull if you don't want the default primitives
get the raw VAO so we can map it etc
default constructor
dtor

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &_name, Real const *_data, unsigned int _Size) noexcept
memberdef.name: createVAOFromHeader

briefdescription.para: create a VAO from a static header file of data in the TNV format this will usually be created from the Obj2VBO program in the Models directory

parameterdescription.para: the name reference for the VBO lookup
a pointer to the data to load
the size of the array of data to load

briefdescription.para: create the default VAO's this is done by the ctor anyway but can be called if the clear method is called. Note you will need to incude VAOHeaders in the client side

simplesect.para: these data sets are huge and compilation takes a long time hence only enable if needed

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &_name, const std::vector< vertData > &_data, const GLenum _mode) noexcept
memberdef.name: createVAO

briefdescription.para: the method to actually create the VAO from the various other methods Note this is used in conjunction with the vertData struct

parameterdescription.para: the name to store in the map of the VBO
the raw data packed into the vertData structure
the mode to draw

briefdescription.para: create the elements of a circle this is borrowed from freeglut

parameterdescription.para: a pointer to the sin elements of the table
a pointer to the cos element of the table
the number of points to calculate.

briefdescription.para: VAO based object primitives used for fast openGL drawing this is a singelton class so we use the instance method to get access and construct the only instance.

simplesect.para: Last Revision 20/06/11 created and removed VBO class
